verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to the rebellious<WH5637> children<WH1121>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that take<WH6213> counsel<WH6098>, but not of me<WH5258>; and that make a league<WH4541>, but not of my Spirit<WH7307>, that they may add<WH5595> sin<WH2403> to sin<WH2403>,

The burden<WH4853> of the beasts<WH929> of the South<WH5045>. For it is a rebellious<WH4805> people<WH5971>, lying<WH3586> children<WH1121>, children<WH1121> that will<WH14> not hear<WH8085> the law<WH8451> of Jehovah<WH3068>;

that say<WH559> to the seers<WH7200>, See<WH7200> not<WH2374>; and to the prophets, Prophesy<WH2372> not unto us right things<WH5229>, speak<WH1696> unto us smooth things<WH2513>, prophesy<WH2372> deceits<WH4123>,

Wherefore thus saith<WH559> the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>, Because ye despise<WH3988> this word<WH1697>, and trust<WH982> in oppression<WH6233> and perverseness<WH3868>, and rely thereon<WH8172>;

For thus said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>, In returning<WH7729> and rest<WH5183> shall ye be saved<WH3467>; in quietness<WH8252> and in confidence<WH985> shall be your strength<WH1369>. And ye would not<WH14>:

Behold <WH8034>, the name of Jehovah<WH3068> cometh<WH935> from far<WH4801>, burning<WH1197> with his anger<WH639>, and in thick<WH4858> rising smoke<WH3514>: his lips<WH8193> are full<WH4390> of indignation<WH2195>, and his tongue<WH3956> is as a devouring<WH398> fire<WH784>;

And Jehovah<WH3068> will cause his glorious<WH1935> voice<WH6963> to be heard<WH8085>, and will show<WH7200> the lighting down<WH5183> of his arm<WH2220>, with the indignation<WH2197> of his anger<WH639>, and the flame<WH3851> of a devouring<WH398> fire<WH784>, with a blast<WH5311>, and tempest<WH2230>, and hailstones<WH68>.
